installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip libstdc++6 lib32gcc1 ca-certificates xvfb screen
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${APPID} validate +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
# Get First-Time Setup Configuration Files
echo "#!/bin/sh
export WINEARCH=win64
export WINEPREFIX=/mnt/server/.wine64
xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args='-screen 0 640x480x24:32'
wine /mnt/server/SpaceEngineersDedicated.exe -console" > /mnt/server/start_se.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/start_se.sh
